title: Can woman in menses period offer prostration of recitation, gratitude & recite Quran assim al hakeem
transcript: menstruating women perform tilawa it is an issue of dispute whether a woman in her Menses can recite the Quran or not in the most authentic opinion that we've mentioned so many times is that it is totally permissible for a woman who is in her Menses to recite the Quran whether from her memory or from touching a Quran with a uh apart something that protects it like gloves or a piece of cloth or reading it from books of tafsir or from electronic gadgets such as as a PC or a PDA or a phone this is all permissible what is the ruling if a woman comes and recites a H yeah that has recitation in it can she perform an eye that has prostration in it can she perform prostration of recitation the most authentic opinion is that a whim a woman in her menses is not allowed to pray a woman who or a man who is not in the state of wudu must not offer prayer but prostration of recitation or prostration of gratitude is not a prayer therefore if if someone says Allahu Akbar and prostrates whether he's doing it to the Qibla or elsewhere whether his Aura is covered or not whether he is in the state of Purity or not this is totally permissible because he is not praying and pahara Purity uplifting the May the ritual the major and minor ritual impurity is required when you are going to offer prayer but if you're going to offer such prostrations that do not have in the beginning and salaam at the end because this is not a prayer then there is no problem in doing that and Allah Knows Best
